attributes.action: refrain from passing reactive legislation after Haymarket and Glasgow attacks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Previous Governments have already brought about much draconian "anti-terror" legislation and many crime-prevention measures that have significantly abridged the liberty of the law abiding majority. We understand that we cannot be 100% protected from violence and have no appetite for further illiberal measures.
